CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT(Work_Item_Phase__r.Work_Conditions__c) == 'Vacant work area: clear path travel', if(RA_WI_Lookup_Detail__r.Flag1__c == 2, 0.02,0) , IF(TEXT(Work_Item_Phase__r.Work_Conditions__c) == 'Vacant work area: difficult path travel',if(RA_WI_Lookup_Detail__r.Flag1__c == 1,0.01,if(RA_WI_Lookup_Detail__r.Flag1__c == 2,0.1,0)), IF(TEXT(Work_Item_Phase__r.Work_Conditions__c) == 'Partially vacant work area',if(RA_WI_Lookup_Detail__r.Flag1__c == 1,0.02,if(RA_WI_Lookup_Detail__r.Flag1__c == 2,0.2,0)), IF(TEXT(Work_Item_Phase__r.Work_Conditions__c) == 'Fully occupied',if(RA_WI_Lookup_Detail__r.Flag1__c == 1,0.05,if(RA_WI_Lookup_Detail__r.Flag1__c == 2,0.35,0)),0))))
CustomField.label: Phase Condition Percent
